data.title: After CMH
data.meta_description: After CMH | Private Montessori School | Loveland, OH
data.text:
Our curriculum concludes after middle school, but for our students, that’s just the beginning.

Think of some of the world’s leading innovators and entrepreneurs. Our pioneers. Forces for change. The ones who knew how to think outside the box, using their creativity and knowledge in entirely original ways:

Larry Page. Sergey Brin. Julia Child. Princes William and Harry. Peter Drucker. Steve Case. Joshua Bell. Katherine Graham. Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis. Jeff Bezos. George Clooney. Anne Frank. Gabriel Garcia Marquez. Yo Yo Ma. And so many more. They all credit Montessori with teaching them how to think differently and inspiring them to do their best to improve – and change – the world.

As a private Montessori school in the heart of Loveland, our graduates easily and naturally transition to a variety of public and private schools, armed with both advanced academics and highly developed social skills. The following is a list of where many of our graduates continue:
